name: Professor Green
description:
'''Stephen Paul Manderson''' (born 27 November 1983), better known by his stage name '''Professor Green''' or simply '''Pro Green''', is an English pop artist, rapper, singer, songwriter, actor, television personality and mental health activist from London.

Growing up on a council estate in Clapton, east London, Green went on to become a multi-platinum artist, with 3.5 million combined sales in the UK. He is the former co-host of ''[[Lip Sync Battle UK]]'' on [[Channel 5 (UK)|Channel 5]]. His autobiography featured on the ''Times'' bestseller list, and he is a supporter of the [[suicide prevention]] charity [[Campaign Against Living Miserably|CALM]].
